item.description:
Join us for National Public Health Week 2012.

This week we will cover many topics to assist the public in health education.

All the classes in thie series are FREE!!!

Tuesday the 3rd Smoking Cessation Information, (using hypnosis)

Thursday the 5th, Sexuality Education, a fun and important topic

Friday the 6th Stress Management, mulitple ways to deal with stress.

 

Tuesday! See you there!!! This program is free!

 

Sue Nordamo, Hypnotherapist and R.N. will talk about how hypnosis works and how it can help people quit smoking.  Understand hypnosis and experience the effect it can have on your body and mind and specifically your decision making skills. Tuesday, April 3rd, 6:30-8:00 pm

 

Follow  up!

Wednesday, April 11th, Check our website for costs and openings!

Give yourself the BREATH OF LIFE and say GOODBYE to cigarettes! Join Sue Nordemo for a 90-minute seminar for those who WANT to STOP SMOKING. Here’s what to expect: Learn what you will GAIN as a Non-Smoker, listen to some GOOD suggestions to help you QUIT, learn about Hypnosis and what it can do for you,  and experience a LIVE Hypnosis Session for Smoking Cessation. REMEMBER ~ When you have made the right decision for you, IT WORKS! Handout’s and CD’s will be available. Seating limited – Pre-registration Required (no registration at the door)

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: FREE Smoking Cessation Program
